mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_pet (pet_name, pet_birthdate, pet_weight, pet_gender, adopted_at, pet_img1, pet_img2, pet_img3, login_email) VALUES (#{pet_name}, #{pet_birthdate}, #{pet_weight}, #{pet_gender}, sysdate, #{pet_img1}, #{pet_img2}, #{pet_img3}, #{login_email});
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_pet SET pet_name = #{pet_name}, pet_birthdate = #{pet_birthdate}, pet_weight = #{pet_weight} , pet_gender = #{pet_gender}, pet_img1 = #{pet_img1}, pet_img2 = #{pet_img2}, pet_img3 = #{pet_img3}, login_email = #{login_email} WHERE pet_idx = #{pet_idx};
